## Spotify

```{r}
#devtools::install_github("thebioengineer/tidytuesdayR")
library(tidytuesdayR)
```

```{r}
tuesdata <- tidytuesdayR::tt_load(2020, week = 4)
```

```{r}
spotify_songs <- tuesdata$spotify_songs
```

```{r}
dup_counts <- spotify_songs %>% count(track_name, track_artist) %>% pull(n)
spotify_songs$track_id %>% n_distinct()
```

```{r}
gf_histogram(~ dup_counts)
```


```{r}
spotify_songs %>% group_by(track_name, track_artist) %>% filter(n() > 5) %>% mutate(n = n())
```
